title: Bubba Watson on Life Beyond Golf (Podcast)
itunes:title: Bubba Watson on Life Beyond Golf (Podcast)
description:
Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu, and Mike Lynch speak with Professional Golfer Bubba Watson on his new book “Up and Down: Victories and Struggles in the Course of Life”. We talk to the two time Masters champion about the mental pressures facing today’s athletes and why he chose to put his family first. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
